relationships.description: Harry and Ron were partnered together in the Charms exam. This is mentioned in the text as 'Ron, who was partnering him'.

Hermione had predicted that Professor Flitwick would test them on Cheering Charms. This is mentioned in the text as 'Hermione had been right; Professor Flitwick did indeed test them on Cheering Charms'.
